None.Name: Root
None.Description: Enable to become immobile and gain: Spikes, Linked Fire

None.Name: Spikes
None.Description: Every 5 seconds, unit erupts a line of spikes from the ground that deal several times damage to all enemies they strike. Each eruption of spikes deals 100 damage to all enemies they strike , up to 150 in total.

None.Name: Linked Fire
None.Description: Up to 5 entities connected to the root network support each other enabling more powerful attacks.

Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Lifepoints +120
Linked Fire: +1 Unit able to support the Network

Extra.en: Each unit (buildings do not count) in the Root Network increases the amount of projectiles of Spikes,  increasing its damage by roughly 300,  up to a maximum of 6 additional units at U3.
